content.rendered:
Directed by Danis Tanovic

Written by Darab Farooqui. Andy Paterson. Andy Paterson. Vibhu Puri. Danis Tanovic

Cast Emraan Hashmi (Ayan). Geetanjali Thapa (Zainab (as Geetanjali)). Danny Huston (Alex). Khalid Abdalla (Nadeem). Adil Hussain (Bilal). Satyadeep Misra (Dr. Faiz). Maryam d’Abo (Maggie). Heino Ferch (Michael). Sam Reid (Frank). Vinod Nagpal (Mustafa). Supriya Pathak (Ayan’s Mother) . Raoul Amaar Abbas (Imran). Ashwath Bhatt (Dr. Saleem). Zachary Coffin (Executive Trainer). Ulrike HÃ¼bschmann (Lawyer). Manreet Kaur (Muslim Investigative Officer). Karanveer Khullar ((as Karanveer)). Christoph Kottenkamp (Lawyer). Wolfgang Krewe (Executive Producer). Shubham Malhotra (Interviewee). Urs Remond (LASTA Executive). Rubina (Nurse). Frank-Otto Schenk (Network Executive (as Frank Schenk)). Roman Shamov (Director (as Roman Leitner)).Navdeep Singh. Inayat Sood (Nurse 1)

Language Hindi. English. Urdu. German

Producers Muhitt Agarwaal. Vishal Bajaj. Marc Baschet. Kshitij Chaudhary. Prashita Chaudhary. Annalise Davis. Praveen Hashmi. Achin Jain. Anurag Kashyap. Rashmi Kohli. CÃ©domir Kolar. Susanne Mann. Guneet Monga. Andy Paterson. Harjit Singh Rai. Pratik Rawal. Meraj Shaikh

Production Sikhya Entertainment. Cinemorphi. Asap Film
